column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Last year I went to visit my cousins in California .
#text=Since I live in New York , I had to fly in an airplane to get there .
#text=I purchased a ticket at the ticket counter and then went to the gate where I would get onto the airplane .
#text=I listened carefully for the announcement that boarding would begin and was first in line to get on .
#text=Once I was on the plane , I put my suitcase in the overhead compartment and found my seat .
#text=I had chosen a seat near the window so that I could easily see the clouds and the cities below me .
#text=I sat down and put my seat belt on .
#text=Before the flight could take off a flight attendant had to give some important safety instructions .
#text=I listened carefully so that I would know what to do in an emergency .
#text=Then I sat back and waited for the plane to take off .
#text=I was surprised by how loud the engines were when the plane started moving .
#text=When it took off and rose up into the air , I was so excited I could hardly stand it .
